gift_card.content:
Step 1: Own at least 01 Holiday Mystery Box at {{link}}

Step 2: Claim your Gift Card every 24 hours

Ultra box will give you 20 Cards/day
Premium box will give you 5 Cards/day
Standard box will give you 2 Cards/day
